Ποιοι είμαστε

Που, πως και γιατι

Πως ξεκίνησαν όλα

A few words about One Click More...

Alex and I met in 2010. We collaborated for 4 years in an Amsterdam based online advertising company, and it was during a break from work that the discussion about One Click More came up.

The timing wasn’t right though. We both had bigger fish to fry but since we loved the idea, we promised ourselves to build and promote the platform at some point in the future.

Well, the future is here and we’re proud to present you an option. An option to help community based charities whenever you buy something online. Without any extra cost (on top of your purchase) or obligation. Just One Click More.

Hopefully, you’ll like this idea and use the page whenever you buy something online.

Don’t let anything go to waste! Pick an e-shop, pick a cause and send the commission where is needed the most.

Tell your friends about it too!

Our goal is to help millions of people around the world through this project.

While making money to survive is important, helping our communities is paramount. We’re always striving to do impactful work we’re proud of in lieu of just having profit in mind.

Our parents still don’t understand what this site is all about

Some people have explained it to them but it's unclear how we raise money for charities without anyone paying anything extra.

So let’s say this: we've built a platform that allows users to effectively help a charity through their online purchase without a penny extra!

We come from diverse backgrounds and are united by an enthusiasm to help out community based causes. We are known as social entrepreneurs. Our goal is to help charities and people all across UK. While making money to survive is important, helping our communities is paramount.

If you are reading this because you really are curious about us (as in the people behind the site), you may check out our glamour shots below.
